content.value: Medellín, the capital of Antioquia and city of eternal spring is on the verge to become the Latin American Center for the 4th Industrial Revolution. With this development, new skills like coding and data science are in higher demand than ever before and we want to give everyone the chance to acquire these skills with no previous knowledge required. We at TechLabs want to enable people from all backgrounds to make their first steps in coding or to deepen their existing knowledge in Artificial Intelligence. To do this, our community offers the Digital Shaper Program: During the 6-month program in Data Science, Web Development or Artificial Intelligence our participants work on online courses, take part in community events, learn from interesting workshops with our corporate partners and develop their hands-on coding projects to deepen their digital skills.
We look forward to welcome you at TechLabs Medellín!
